Modele

Class Observable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Modele.Observable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Joueur, Partie, Tas

    public class Observable
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Observable class used in the Observer design pattern. It allows its subclasses to notify, add and remove observers.
    Author:
    dinh_,tran_
    See Also:
    Joueur, Partie, Tas

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_OBSERVES
      The max number of observers an observable can have

      Reset changes
      void deleteObserver(Observer o)
      This method removes an observer from it's array
      void notifyObservers(java.lang.Object o)

    • Method Detail

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(Observer o)
        This method allows an Observable to add an Observer into their array
        Parameters:
        o - the observer to be added

      • deleteObserver

        public void deleteObserver(Observer o)
        This method removes an observer from it's array
        Parameters:
        o - the observer to be removed

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers(java.lang.Object o)
        This method notify all observers if the Observable has changed state, then reset the state. Else it doesn't notify
        Parameters:
        o - the nature of the notification

      • setChanged

        public void setChanged()
        Set the state to changed

        public void clearChanged()
        Reset changes
